description.value:
Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Twin Riposte]{Twin Riposte}. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Twin Parry]{Twin Parry}.
